verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> concerning the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

If a man <S%H376><s%> vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, or swear <S%H7650><s%> an oath <S%H7621><s%> to bind <S%H631><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> with a bond <S%H632><s%>; he shall not break <S%H2490><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%>, he shall do <S%H6213><s%> according to all that proceedeth <S%H3318><s%> out of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

If a woman <S%H802><s%> also vow <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and bind <S%H631><s%> herself by a bond <S%H632><s%>, being in her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in her youth <S%H5271><s%>;

And her father <S%H1><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> her vow <S%H5088><s%>, and her bond <S%H632><s%> wherewith she hath bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%>, and her father <S%H1><s%> shall hold his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her: then all her vows <S%H5088><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%>, and every bond <S%H632><s%> wherewith she hath bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%>.

But if her father <S%H1><s%> disallow <S%H5106><s%> her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heareth <S%H8085><s%>; not any of her vows <S%H5088><s%>, or of her bonds <S%H632><s%> wherewith she hath bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%>, shall stand <S%H6965><s%>: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall forgive <S%H5545><s%> her, because her father <S%H1><s%> disallowed <S%H5106><s%> her.
And if she had at all an husband <S%H376><s%>, when she vowed <S%H5088><s%>, or uttered <S%H4008><s%> ought out of her lips <S%H8193><s%>, wherewith she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%>;

And her husband <S%H376><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, and held his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard <S%H8085><s%> it: then her vows <S%H5088><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%>, and her bonds <S%H632><s%> wherewith she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%>.

But if her husband <S%H376><s%> disallowed <S%H5106><s%> her on the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard <S%H8085><s%> it; then he shall make her vow which she vowed <S%H5088><s%>, and that which she uttered <S%H4008><s%> with her lips <S%H8193><s%>, wherewith she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%>, of none effect <S%H6565><s%>: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall forgive <S%H5545><s%> her.

But every vow <S%H5088><s%> of a widow <S%H490><s%>, and of her that is divorced <S%H1644><s%>, wherewith they have bound <S%H631><s%> their souls <S%H5315><s%>, shall stand <S%H6965><s%> against her.
And if she vowed <S%H5087><s%> in her husband's <S%H376><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, or bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> by a bond <S%H632><s%> with an oath <S%H7621><s%>;

And her husband <S%H376><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, and held his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her, and disallowed <S%H5106><s%> her not: then all her vows <S%H5088><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%>, and every bond <S%H632><s%> wherewith she bound <S%H631><s%> her soul <S%H5315><s%> shall stand <S%H6965><s%>.

But if her husband <S%H376><s%> hath utterly <S%H6565><s%> made them void <S%H6565><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> he heard <S%H8085><s%> them; then whatsoever proceeded <S%H4161><s%> out of her lips <S%H8193><s%> concerning her vows <S%H5088><s%>, or concerning the bond <S%H632><s%> of her soul <S%H5315><s%>, shall not stand <S%H6965><s%>: her husband <S%H376><s%> hath made them void <S%H6565><s%>; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall forgive <S%H5545><s%> her.

Every vow <S%H5088><s%>, and every binding <S%H632><s%> oath <S%H7621><s%> to afflict <S%H6031><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%>, her husband <S%H376><s%> may establish <S%H6965><s%> it, or her husband <S%H376><s%> may make it void <S%H6565><s%>.

But if her husband <S%H376><s%> altogether <S%H2790><s%> hold his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her from day <S%H3117><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>; then he establisheth <S%H6965><s%> all her vows <S%H5088><s%>, or all her bonds <S%H632><s%>, which are upon her: he confirmeth <S%H6965><s%> them, because he held his peace <S%H2790><s%> at her in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he heard <S%H8085><s%> them.
But if he shall any ways <S%H6565><s%> make them void <S%H6565><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that he hath heard <S%H8085><s%> them; then he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> her iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

These are the statutes <S%H2706><s%>, which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, between a man <S%H376><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%>, between the father <S%H1><s%> and his daughter <S%H1323><s%>, being yet in her youth <S%H5271><s%> in her father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.
